stripped_text: You cannot use Oracle May more than once per turn. click: Name a card type. Reveal the top card of your stack. If the revealed card is of the named type, draw it and gain 2 credits. Otherwise, trash it.
text:
You cannot use Oracle May more than once per turn.
[click]: Name a card type. Reveal the top card of your stack. If the revealed card is of the named type, draw it and gain 2[credit]. Otherwise, trash it.
title: Oracle May
